mapper.insert: insert into TBL_REPLY (bno, reply, replyer) values(#{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update TBL_REPLY set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate() where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate, updatedate, TBL_MEMBER.member_filename from TBL_REPLY, TBL_MEMBER where bno = #{bno} and TBL_MEMBER.nickname = TBL_REPLY.replyer order by rno asc limit #{cri.startIndex}, #{cri.amount}
mapper.update: update TBL_BOARD set reply_count = reply_count + 1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from TBL_REPLY where bno = #{bno}
